Activity: Coffee, emails. Scan through more reference images for the environment, focusing on the architectural style and level of detail.
Continue refining the environmental blockout. Add more detail to the larger structures and start blocking out the smaller buildings and objects.
Email @lvdn-1 the lead level designer, Subject: Environment Blockout Feedback Request Body: 'Hi, i finished the environment blockout. Can you give me some feedback?'
After the feedback, incorporate the feedback from the lead level designer to the environment blockout. Refine the shapes and proportions of the buildings and adjust the layout as needed.

Start working on the animation library. Begin with the most basic movement animations, such as walking, running, and jumping. Create a simple rig for one of the character blockouts to test the animations.
Wrap up for the day. Save and backup all the work. Check emails.
